thread.title: Thousands Turning To Health Sharing As Affordable Alternative To Short-Term Health Insurance Plans

author: MENAFN
title: Thousands Turning To Health Sharing As Affordable Alternative To Short-Term Health Insurance Plans
text: Forgot Username or Password Date (MENAFN- EIN Presswire) As feds limit short-term health insurance plans to 4 months, health sharing enrollment soars as solution to coverage gaps.
